page.title: 08 Church and People.
page.content: The last few years have seen a continued retreat from the{church}as the focal point of social and religious life which it has occupied for centuries. There is still a strong religious element in the life of people but there is greater use nowadays of more lowly centres of interest, such as the village{public {house}and the retreat into private homes to watch the nightly output of {television}programmes. These have changed the ideas and interests of people to the extent that there is less dependence on the church to provide support and guidance. {Village halls}are regularly used as community centres and financial help is provided for them in the form of grants from the local{Councils.
